data.title: Press point by Guy VERHOFSTADT (ALDE, BE), Parliament's coordinator for the negotiations on the UK withdrawal from the EU following the Brexit Steering Group meeting with the 3 million representatives
data.meta_description: Guy VERHOFSTADT (ALDE, BE), Parliament's coordinator for the negotiations on the UK withdrawal from the EU, gives a press point following the Brexit Steering Group meeting with the 3 million representatives and Home Office officials.
